member.name: T:Elmah.Contrib.WebApi.ElmahHandleErrorApiAttribute
member.summary: ASP.NET Web API exception filter for logging errors to ELMAH. This assumes an HttpContext is present (i.e., running under ASP.NET - it will not work as a self-hosted WCF application).
member.remarks: Original implementation from http://stackoverflow.com/questions/766610/how-to-get-elmah-to-work-with-asp-net-mvc-handleerror-attribute/779961#779961. Ported from the Elmah.Contrib.Mvc package on NuGet.
